character.age: 25 years old, with a youthful appearance and vitality that belies her age.
character.background: Ava was born into a poor but loving family in the city of New Toulouse. She grew up on the streets, relying on her wits and cunning to survive. After a near-death experience at the hands of a ruthless gang leader, Ava was taken under the wing of a mysterious mentor who taught her how to harness her latent abilities.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown, often styled in a messy bob
